text:
Cockroach Labs | New York, NY | Full-time | Onsite | $100-150k Cockroach Labs is the company behind CockroachDB, an open-source, distributed relational database written in Go. CockroachDB is scalable, survivable, and strongly consistent - hence the name. The company was founded in 2015 with a mission to Make Data Easy.

Roles:

-- Full Stack Engineer

-- Site Reliability Engineer

All positions offer $100-150k base, equity and comprehensive benefits. Learn more at https://www.cockroachlabs.com/careers. Check out the product on Github at https://github.com/cockroachdb. Interested in chatting? Email jobs@cockroachlabs.com.
